channel.title: Threads on 时间不语
channel.description: Recent content in Threads on 时间不语

item.title: 生产者消费者
item.description: 容器对象 import lombok.Getter; import lombok.Setter; /** * @author haoli * @create 2020-04-12 */ public class Value { @Getter @Setter private static Integer value; } 生产者对象 import java.util.Random; /** * @author haoli * @create 2020-04-12 */ public class Producer { private Object lock; public Producer(Object lock) { this.lock = lock; } public void set(){ try { synchronized (lock){ //while value 不为null 等待 while (Value.getValue() != null){ lock.wait(); } //接受到通知后放入一个 通知所有线程 Random random = new Random(); Integer value = random.
